author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Southern Railway will operate the following special trains to clear the extra rush of traffic:

The Chennai Egmore-Tiruchi superfast special train (06207) will leave Chennai Egmore at 10.45 p.m. on March 14 and reach Tiruchi at 6 a.m. the next day.

The train will halt at Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Tiruppadiripuliyur, Chidambaram, Mayiladuthurai, Kumbakonam, and Thanjavur.

The Tiruchi–Bhagat Ki Kothi Special Train (06208) will leave Tiruchi at 1 p.m. on March 15 and reach Bhagat Ki Kothi at 5.25 p.m. on March 17.

Both the trains would have 13 sleeper class and two luggage-cum-brake van coaches.

Advance reservations for the trains are open, according to a Southern Railway press release.
title: Special trains on March 14, 15
